PHRASE.LANG: kName
Portrait of Lord Patrick
Portrait de Lord Patrick
Porträt von Lord Patrick
Ritratto di Lord Patrick
Retrato del Señor Patrick
パトリック卿の肖像画
패트릭 경의 초상화
Portrait of Lord Patrick
帕特里克勳爵的畫像
帕特里克勳爵的畫像
Portrait of Lord Patrick
kDesc
This portrait is of Lord Patrick who disappeared mysteriously in 1803. Legend has it that he was trapped within the portrait after being the victim of a terrible curse.[#Legal]
Il s'agit d'un portrait de Lord Patrick, ayant disparu mystérieusement en 1803. La légende raconte qu'il serait prisonnier du portrait suite à un terrible sortilège.[#Legal]

Dieses Porträt ist von Lord Patrick, der im Jahr 1803 auf mysteriöse Weise verschwunden ist. Der Legende nach soll er in einem Porträt feststecken, nachdem er das Opfer eines schrecklichen Fluchs geworden war. [#Legal]
Ritratto di Lord Patrick, sparito misteriosamente nel 1803. La leggenda narra che fosse stato intrappolato nel dipinto dopo essere stato vittima di una terribile maledizione.[#Legal]
Retrato de Lord Patrick, quien desapareció misteriosamente en 1803. La leyenda cuenta que un maleficio terrible lo atrapó en el retrato.[#Legal]
1803年に忽然と姿を消したパトリック卿の肖像画。恐ろしい呪いにより肖像画に閉じ込められたのだという伝説もある。[#Legal]
이 초상화는 1803년에 기이하게 사라진 패트릭 경의 것입니다. 전설에 따르면 무서운 저주의 피해자가 된 후로 초상화에 갖혀버렸다고 합니다.[#Legal]
This portrait is of Lord Patrick who disappeared mysteriously in 1803. Legend has it that he was trapped within the portrait after being the victim of a terrible curse.[#Legal]
這是於1803年神秘失蹤的帕特里克勳爵的畫像。傳說他因為可怕的詛咒而被困在畫像中。[#Legal]
這是於1803年神秘失蹤的帕特里克勳爵的畫像。傳說他因為可怕的詛咒而被困在畫像中。[#Legal]
This portrait is of Lord Patrick who disappeared mysteriously in 1803. Legend has it that he was trapped within the portrait after being the victim of a terrible curse.[#Legal]
